subject: Davis Cup
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Mike Bryan and Mardy Fish rallied to beat Fernando Verdasco and Feliciano López on clay to give the United States, the defending champion, its first point after being swept in singles play Friday.
snippet: Mike Bryan and Mardy Fish rallied to beat Fernando Verdasco and Feliciano López on clay to give the United States, the defending champion, its first point after being swept in singles play Friday.
